snippet: Prosecutors said Larry B. Seabrook should not mention the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. to the jury; his lawyers accused prosecutors of disrespect and bias.
abstract: Retrial of New York City Councilman Larry B Seabrook on federal corruption charges has not even begun but defense lawyers and prosecutors have already been brawling for months; first trial ended in a mistrial after the jury deadlocked; Seabrook is accused of funneling city tax money to relatives and friends through nonprofit organizations he controlled.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Larry B. Seabrook should not mention the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. to the jury; his lawyers accused prosecutors of disrespect and bias.

headline.seo: Each Side Arguing Over Councilman Larry Seabrook Retrial
